comments.body: Either remove those blank lines here, or add one before `case arg: Int`. Otherwise it's not consistent, and it looks like `Short` and `Int` are more related than the other ones.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +407,411 @@            formatCharString(arg.toChar.toString)

          case arg: Char =>
            checkValidCodePoint(arg)
            formatCharString(arg.toString)
